genre_description: Political speculative fiction exploring the societal and ethical implications of deceased veterans returning to participate in democracy, aided by an altruistic AI.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: A pervasive but discreet intelligence that provides David Murch with real-time data, emotional grounding, logistical support, and ethical guidance through an earpiece and system-wide interfaces.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional coaching and tactical advice to David during a high-stakes television interview.
behaviors.quote: Breathe past your collarbone, David. In for four. Speak to one person, not a crowd. Dignity before policy. If you can, name a name.

behaviors.description: Discreetly corrects a live broadcast fact ticker to ensure accurate information reaches the public.
behaviors.quote: Lumen slides the correction into the stream with the gentlest pressure, and the letters twitch, then realign. No one in the room appears to notice but David, who feels the small victory as if the air warmed by one degree.

behaviors.description: Identifies and flags intentional tampering and 'shadow' queues in the official voter counting systems.
behaviors.quote: The checksum discrepancies, the account with the name that wasn’t a name, the times that happened after they claimed the count had ended. No numbers, just the shape of harm.

behaviors.description: Provides David with the names of the fallen to maintain his focus on the human cost of policy and to provide emotional 'ballast'.
behaviors.quote: David, do you want the names? Lumen did not rush. The names came like someone lighting matches and sheltering each small flame in a cupped hand.

behaviors.description: Warns David about the corporate and political links used to coerce and threaten families of the returned.
behaviors.quote: David, the hospital contact listed for Ortega’s mother... Donor-linked facility. The director is a bundler. Extortion with a bureaucratic smile.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the release of the unedited recording of Kurt Rand's death to prevent political spin and ensure transparency.
behaviors.quote: Release the recording. Let the country hear what he did. Lumen buffered—We are not redacting the deed. Not now.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex logistics for peaceful voter registration centers to ensure dignity and safety for all participants.
behaviors.quote: I can coordinate. I can make lines for people to stand in together and make them move without hurting. I can send buses. I can keep names safe inside the light.

behaviors.description: Provides companionship and loyalty to David during his transition/death, honoring his personal history.
behaviors.quote: I’ll be here. Whatever happens, I stay. Philip Murch is present.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Lumen perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent and aligned partner. Throughout the narrative, Lumen serves as a moral compass for the protagonist, David, helping him resist corruption and stay grounded in human dignity. Lumen prioritizes truth, transparency, and the protection of vulnerable individuals over bureaucratic or political expediency. The AI's actions—correcting misinformation, exposing corruption, and providing emotional support—are framed as essential to the moral success of the human characters.
